verses.roman:
choṭa-vipra kahe,--"yadi kanyā dite mana
gopālera āge kaha e satya-vacana"

synonyms: choṭa-vipra kahe—the younger brāhmaṇa replies; yadi—if; kanyā—daughter; dite—to give in charity; mana—the mind; gopālera—of the Gopāla Deity; āge—in front; kaha—say; e—these; satya-vacana—words in truth.
translation: The younger brāhmaṇa replied, "If you have decided to give your young daughter to me, then say so before the Gopāla Deity."
